mapper.select:
SELECT pts.device_type_code, dt.`name` deviceTypeName, d.`name` deviceName, su.realname username, cl.line_name, cs.station_name, ptd.* FROM patrol_task_device ptd JOIN patrol_task_standard pts ON ptd.task_standard_id = pts.id AND pts.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN cs_line cl ON ptd.line_code = cl.line_code AND cl.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN cs_station cs ON ptd.station_code = cs.station_code AND cs.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN device_type dt ON pts.device_type_code = dt.`code` AND dt.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON ptd.user_id = su.id AND su.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN device d ON ptd.device_code = d.`code` AND d.del_flag = 0 WHERE ptd.del_flag = 0
and ptd.patrol_number = #{patrolNumber}

SELECT (select dv.name from device dv where ptd.device_code = dv.code) as deviceName, ptd.* FROM patrol_task_device ptd LEFT JOIN device dv on ptd.device_code = dv.code WHERE ptd.del_flag = 0 AND ptd.task_id = #{id}
and CONCAT_WS(',', ptd.patrol_number, ptd.device_code, dv.name) like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
select (select CONCAT(t2.line_name, "/", t2.station_name) from cs_station t2 where t1.station_code = t2.station_code) as station from patrol_task_station t1 where t1.task_code = #{code}
SELECT * FROM device WHERE device.del_flag = 0 AND device.`code` = #{deviceCode}

SELECT concat(t2.line_name, "/", t2.station_name) AS positionCodeName, t3.name as deviceType, t1.* FROM device t1 LEFT JOIN cs_station t2 ON t1.station_code = t2.station_code LEFT JOIN device_type t3 on t1.device_type_code = t3.code where t1.code = #{code}

SELECT t3.* FROM patrol_task_standard t1 LEFT JOIN patrol_task_device t2 on t1.id = t2.task_standard_id and t1.task_id = t2.task_id LEFT JOIN patrol_standard t3 on t3.code = t1.standard_code WHERE t2.id = #{deviceId}
select major_name from cs_major where major_code = #{majorCode} and del_flag = 0
select system_name from cs_subsystem where system_code = #{systemCode} and del_flag = 0
select position_name from cs_station_position where staion_code = #{stationCode} and del_flag = 0

SELECT ptd.id billId, ptd.patrol_number billCode, CONCAT(ps.`name`, IF(d.`name` IS NOT NULL, CONCAT('(', d.`name`, ')'), '')) tableName, IF(ptd.device_code IS NOT NULL, d.station_code, ptd.station_code) stationCode, cs.station_name FROM patrol_task_device ptd LEFT JOIN device d ON ptd.device_code = d.`code` AND d.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN cs_station cs ON IF(ptd.device_code IS NOT NULL, d.station_code, ptd.station_code) = cs.station_code AND cs.del_flag = 0 JOIN patrol_task_standard pts ON ptd.task_standard_id = pts.id AND pts.del_flag = 0 JOIN patrol_standard ps ON pts.standard_id = ps.id AND ps.del_flag = 0 WHERE ptd.del_flag = 0
AND ptd.task_id = #{taskId}

SELECT station_name FROM cs_station WHERE del_flag = 0
AND station_code = #{stationCode}
select sdt.item_text from sys_dict sd LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item sdt on sd.id = sdt.dict_id where sd.dict_code = "device_status" and sdt.item_value = #{status}
select cs.station_name from cs_station cs where cs.station_code = #{stationCode} and cs.del_flag = 0
SELECT ptf.patrol_number FROM patrol_task_fault ptf LEFT JOIN patrol_task_device ptd on ptd.patrol_number = ptf.patrol_number WHERE ptd.task_id = #{taskId}
